description: make.bat: incease runtime test timeout to 300s (fixes build)

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=307211777b7f ***

make.bat: incease runtime test timeout to 300s (fixes build)

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11064044

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

given that we've raised the timeout on windows, could we
do the same to run.bash to fix the build on netbsd-arm-qemu builder?

see https://codereview.appspot.com/10935043/

subject: code review 11064044: make.bat: incease runtime test timeout to 300s (fixes build)
